name: Libtard: The Satire Game
description:
Slay Your Enemies! Or Die Trying... 8-Bit Politicians Battle Their Way To The Glory Of Re-Election! Join Trump, Bernie, Alex Jones + More Down 8 Unique + Hilarious Storylines!

Complete 120 Hilarious and Unique Levels! (On Full Release - 8 Storylines) Follow the side-splitting stories of your favorite political faces and charge into battle against Libtards, Snowflakes and Fascists alike in Libtard: The Satire Game!

Follow Us @LibtardGame On All Socials To Get Updates and Help Influence the Stories!

Presented By Wise Monkey Entertainment Ltd.

- Written and Directed By Gareth Owens -

Starring
John Di Domenico as Donald Trump
Gareth Owens as Secret Service Agent 1+2, Scientist, Melania's Phone, Mr Chihuahua + Vladimir Putin

Game Website - http://www.wisemonkeygames.co.uk/libtard
Merch + Perks Store - http://www.libtardgame.com/shop
